pkgmetadata.longdescription: # phylib[![Build Status](https://img.shields.io/travis/cortex-lab/phylib.svg)](https://travis-ci.org/cortex-lab/phylib)[![codecov.io](https://img.shields.io/codecov/c/github/cortex-lab/phylib.svg)](http://codecov.io/github/cortex-lab/phylib?branch=master)Electrophysiological data analysis library used by [phy](https://github.com/kwikteam/phy/), a spike sorting visualization software, and [ibllib](https://github.com/int-brain-lab/ibllib/).
